actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Army from modifying water control policies in a manner which would interfere with the use of navigation channels.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Army from taking any action which is inconsistent with a water control policy of the Corps of Engineers in effect on January 1, 1995, if such action would result in: (1) a reduction of ten days or more in the total number of days in a year during which vessels are able to use a navigation channel; or (2) a substantial increase in flood damage to lands adjacent to a navigation channel, unless such action is specifically authorized by a law enacted after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Army from modifying water control policies in a manner which would interfere with the use of navigation channels.
